goal.ch:
（1）行銷觀念之建立與行銷管理之程序
（2）行銷機會之分析與探討
（3）培養有關行銷管理，規畫，執行分析與控制之能力
（4）理論貫通之後，提供行銷個案討論，期能以實例驗證理論互相配合
goal.en:
1. To understand marketing concepts and its application.
2. To study marketing management process.
3. To ananlyze consumer, business and global markets.
4. To gain knowledge toward marketing mangement, planning, implementation and
control.
5. To fully integrated marketing concepts and theories through case studies.
